message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe its value is quite high, so I'm starting the bidding at $18,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but $10,000 is quite a bit below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $14,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. This is my final offer, as I've already looked into buying it from John for that price
